00026 #ifndef _ConfigLoader_h_
00027 #define _ConfigLoader_h_
00028 
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include <iostream>
00033 #include <sys/stat.h>
00034 #include <time.h>
00035 #include "server.h"
00036 #include "logger.h"
00037 #include "handyFunctions.h"
00038 
00039 class ConfigLoader
00040 {
00041     public:
00042         ConfigLoader( const std::string &filePath );
00043         ~ConfigLoader();
00044 
00045         class Options
00046         {
00047             public:
00048                 struct stat infos;                 //contiene le info del file di configurazione, tra cui la data dell'ultima modifica
00049                 std::string generalLog;
00050                 std::string generalBackup;
00051                 std::vector<Server*> servers;
00052                 Logger* errors;                     //log dedicato a notifiche ed errori
00053                 Logger* log;                        //log dedicato ai server (cambia di file)
00054                 unsigned int serverNumber;                   //numero del server su cui sto lavorando
00055 
00056                 Server operator[] ( int number ) { return *servers[number]; }
00057                 unsigned int size() { return servers.size(); }
00058                 //distruttore
00059                 ~Options()
00060                 {
00061                     for( unsigned int i = 0; i < servers.size(); i++ )
00062                         delete servers[i];
00063                     delete errors;
00064                     delete log;
00065                 };
00066                 //comoda funzione per cercare un server per nome.
00067                 Server* searchServer(std::string name)
00068                 {
00069                     Server* t = NULL;
00070                     for( unsigned int i = 0; i < servers.size(); i++ )
00071                         if ( name.compare( servers[i]->name() ) == 0 )
00072                             t = servers[i];
00073                         return t;
00074                 };
00075                 
00076                 std::string toString ()
00077                 {
00078                     std::string t;
00079                     t.append( "General log : " );
00080                     t.append( generalLog );
00081                     t.append( "\nGeneral backup : " );
00082                     t.append( generalBackup );
00083                     t.append( "\nServers number : " );
00084                     t.append( intToString( servers.size() ) );
00085                     t.append( "\n" );
00086                     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < servers.size(); i++ )
00087                     {
00088                         t.append ( servers[i]->toString() );
00089                         t.append( "\n" );
00090                     }
00091                     return t;
00092                 };
00093         };
00094 
00095         Options* getOptions();
00096         bool testChanges();
00097         void loadOptions();   //it reloads entire options tree, changes made on object Options*
00098 
00099     private:
00100         std::string generalFile;
00101         Options* opzioni;
00102         bool isA(const std::string &line, char* regex);
00103         std::string extract(const std::string &line);
00104 };
00105 #endif
